languages.text: "Неужели успел{mf||а} позабыть обо мне, {name}? О, не забывай ни на минуту. Ибо как только ты отвернешься, я воткну осколок своего меча тебе в глотку!"
"Have you already forgotten me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"
languages.original_text: "Неужели успел{mf||а} позабыть обо мне, {name}? О, не забывай ни на минуту. Ибо как только ты отвернешься, я воткну осколок своего меча тебе в глотку!"

traits.locale_text: "Have you already forgotten about me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"
"Have you already forgotten about me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"
"Have you already forgotten me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"
"Have you already forgotten me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"
"Have you already forgotten me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"

languages.text: “{name}，你不会已经把我忘了吧？噢，我劝你千万别忘记我，一刻也不要忘记。否则，你一转身，这把利刃就会刺进你的喉咙！”
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"

traits.locale_text: “{name}，你不会已经把我忘了吧？噢，我劝你千万别忘记我，一刻也不要忘记。否则，你一转身，这把利刃就会刺进你的喉咙！”

languages.text: «¿Te habías olvidado de mí, {name}? Oh, más vale que nunca te olvides de mí, ni por un solo instante. ¡Porque en cuanto te des la vuelta, te clavaré lo que queda de mi espada en la garganta!».
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Te habías olvidado de mí, {name}? Oh, más vale que nunca te olvides de mí, ni por un solo instante. ¡Porque en cuanto te des la vuelta, te clavaré lo que queda de mi espada en la garganta!».

languages.text: « Vous m'avez déjà oublié, {name} ? Oh, vous feriez mieux de me garder dans vos pensées à tout moment. Dès que vous aurez le dos tourné, je plongerai mon fragment d'épée dans votre nuque ! »
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez déjà oublié, {name} ? Oh, vous feriez mieux de me garder dans vos pensées à tout moment. Dès que vous aurez le dos tourné, je plongerai mon fragment d'épée dans votre nuque ! »

languages.text: "Habt Ihr mich schon vergessen, {name}? Oh, Ihr dürft mich nie vergessen – nicht einmal für einen Augenblick. Denn sobald Ihr Euch wegdreht, werde ich mein Schwert in Eure Kehle rammen"
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr mich schon vergessen, {name}? Oh, Ihr dürft mich nie vergessen – nicht einmal für einen Augenblick. Denn sobald Ihr Euch wegdreht, werde ich mein Schwert in Eure Kehle rammen"

languages.text: 「{name}よ、もう我のことを忘れてしまったのか？ああ、決して我を忘れてはならない…一瞬たりとも。なぜならば、お前が背を向けたとたん、我は剣の破片をお前の喉に突き立てるのだから！」
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"

traits.locale_text: 「{name}よ、もう我のことを忘れてしまったのか？ああ、決して我を忘れてはならない…一瞬たりとも。なぜならば、お前が背を向けたとたん、我は剣の破片をお前の喉に突き立てるのだから！」

languages.text: "Beni unuttun mu {name}? Beni sakın unutma, bir anlığına bile. Çünkü bana sırtını döndüğün anda kılıcımın ucunu boynuna saplayacağım!"
languages.original_text: "Have you already forgotten me, {name}? Oh, don't ever forget me — not even for a moment. Because as soon as you turn away, I will plunge the shard of my sword into your throat!"

traits.locale_text: "Beni unuttun mu {name}? Beni sakın unutma, bir anlığına bile. Çünkü bana sırtını döndüğün anda kılıcımın ucunu boynuna saplayacağım!"
